segments.text: The kitchen is a disaster with that overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in the puddle; how gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just drying a plate, ignoring the filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are climbing for cookies like animals.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling; they'll make more mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand in the jar, probably dropping crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching up, adding to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole floor will be slippery and nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets getting water damage; it's revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside looks clean, unlike this pigsty inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR
